action.content:
Infer the date from context.

Q: Today is Christmas Eve of 1937. What is the date 10 days ago in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 12/14/2026
(B) 12/14/1950
(C) 12/14/2007
(D) 12/14/1937
(E) 07/14/1938
(F) 12/14/1988
A: (D)

Q: Tomorrow is 11/12/2019. What is the date one year ago from today in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 09/04/2018
(B) 11/11/2018
(C) 08/25/2018
(D) 11/02/2018
(E) 11/04/2018
A: (B)

Q: Jane and John married on Jan 2, 1958. It is their 5-year anniversary today. What is the date tomorrow in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 01/11/1961
(B) 01/03/1963
(C) 01/18/1961
(D) 10/14/1960
(E) 01/03/1982
(F) 12/03/1960
A: (B)

Q: Jane visits the bookstore on the 16th of each month starting from the October of 2009. It is her 5th visit to the bookstore today. What is the date a month ago in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 01/16/2010
(B) 12/19/2009
(C) 01/15/2010
(D) 02/11/2010
(E) 01/17/2010
(F) 10/09/2009
A:

Q: The target grid has a pattern where the first and last rows are identical, and the second and fourth rows are identical. The third row is a vertical line of Xs. The first and last rows have Xs in the second and fourth columns, and the second and fourth rows have Xs in the first and third columns. The third row has Xs in the second and fourth columns. The grid has a total of 16 Xs. What is the number of Xs in the second row?
Answer: 3||
